resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73005</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73005</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4b8de1ae-dd8d-4517-ba2b-1de25286cdd0#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Epedauroszi színház</string>
            <string language="en">Theatre of Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theater von Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théâtre d'Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theatre de Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teatro di Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέατρο Epedauros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teatro de Epedauros</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Epedauroszi színház (A legelső színházakban a hegy oldalába vájt félköríves ülősorok, a theatron előtt volt a kerek orkestra, a kórus helye, mögötte a színpad, a szkéné magasított építménye)</string>
            <string language="en">Theatre of Epedauros (In the very first theatres the rounded orchestra - place of the choir - was in front of the semicircular sitting rows - the theatron - hollowed into the hillside, behind that the stage, the stilted building of the scene)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Epedauroszi színház theatron orkestra kórus szkéné ,  </string>
            <string language="en">Theatre of Epedauros, theatron, orchestra, choir, scene </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theater von Epedauros (in den allerersten 
Theatern, die das aufgerundete Orchester - Ort des Chores - vor den 
halbkreisförmigen sitzenden Reihen - das theatron - ausgehöhlt in 
den Abhang, hinter dem das Stadium war, stilted Gebäude der Szene)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théâtre d'Epedauros (dans les tous premiers 
théâtres l'orchestre arrondi - endroit du choeur - était devant les
lignes se reposantes semi-circulaires - le theatron - creusées dans 
le flanc de coteau, derrière cela l'étape, le bâtiment surélevé de la 
scène)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theatre de Epedauros (muito nos primeiros 
theatres que o orchestra arredondado - lugar do choir - era na frente 
das fileiras se sentando semicirculares - o theatron - tornadas ôcas 
no hillside, atrás disso o estágio, stilted o edifício da cena)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teatro di Epedauros (nei primissimi teatri che 
l'orchestra arrotondata - posto del choir - era davanti le file di 
seduta semicircolari - il theatron - scavate nel hillside, dietro 
quello la fase, stilted la costruzione della scena)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέατρο Epedauros (στα πρώτα -πρώτα θέατρα η 
στρογγυλευμένη ορχήστρα - θέση της χορωδίας - ήταν μπροστά από 
τις ημικυκλικές σειρές συνεδρίασης - το theatron - που 
κοιλάθηκε στη βουνοπλαγιά, πίσω από αυτήν το στάδιο, η 
stilted οικοδόμηση της σκηνής)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teatro de Epedauros (en los primeros teatros que 
la orquesta redondeada - lugar del coro - estaba delante de las filas 
que se sentaban semicirculares - el theatron - ahuecadas en la ladera,
detrás de eso la etapa, stilted el edificio de la escena)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theater von Epedauros, theatron, Orchester, Chor, 
Szene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théâtre d'Epedauros, theatron, orchestre, choeur, 
scène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theatre de Epedauros, theatron, orchestra, choir, cena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teatro di Epedauros, theatron, orchestra, choir, scena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέατρο Epedauros, theatron, ορχήστρα, χορωδία, σκηνή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teatro de Epedauros, theatron, orquesta, coro, escena</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </purpose>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
